subject: Sexual Health
title: Stages of Puberty
description: Learn Stages of Puberty in one minute.

hook.text: Puberty does not happen all at once. It follows a predictable sequence called the Tanner stages.

buildup.text: Tanner stages 1 through 5 describe the progression of breast, genital, and pubic hair development.

discovery.text: Stage 1 is prepubertal. Stage 5 is full adult development. The journey typically spans 2 to 5 years.

twist.text: Children progress at different rates. Two kids the same age can be at completely different Tanner stages.

climax.text: Understanding Tanner stages helps doctors assess whether development is on track or needs attention.

punchline.text: Five stages. Same destination, different speeds.

quiz.question: How many Tanner stages describe pubertal development?
